thread.title: Can You Become Addicted to Marijuana?
thread.title_full: Can You Become Addicted to Marijuana?

title: Can You Become Addicted to Marijuana?
text:
Can You Become Addicted to Marijuana? Posted: reddit 
Many have questioned the addiction properties in marijuana. Is it possible to become addicted to marijuana? Luckily I had Dr. Sanjay Gupta stop by Mondays with Marlo to discuss all of the truths and myths behind medical marijuana and whether or not it's possible to become addicted to cannabis. Watch the video above for all of Sanjay's expertise on medical marijuana and don't forget to submit your questions on Twitter and Facebook for our future guests.
